mapper.select: SELECT p_no, cd.cd_code as CD_CODE, c.cure_code as CURE_CODE, cd.CD_REGDATE as CD_REGDATE, (SELECT DZ_KO_NAME FROM DISEASES s WHERE s.DZ_NUM = c.DZ_NUM)AS DZ_KO_NAME, (SELECT mpr_ko FROM MPRICE m WHERE m.MPR_CODE = c.MPR_CODE ) AS mpr_ko FROM cure c, CURE_DETAIL cd, DISEASES s, MPRICE m WHERE c.CD_CODE = cd.CD_CODE AND s.DZ_NUM =c.DZ_NUM AND m.MPR_CODE = c.MPR_CODE and cd.P_NO = #{pNo}
select count(*) from CURE_DETAIL where CD_CODE is not null

SELECT p_no, cd.cd_code as CD_CODE, c.cure_code as CURE_CODE, cd.CD_REGDATE as CD_REGDATE, (SELECT DZ_KO_NAME FROM DISEASES s WHERE s.DZ_NUM = c.DZ_NUM)AS DZ_KO_NAME, (SELECT mpr_ko FROM MPRICE m WHERE m.MPR_CODE = c.MPR_CODE ) AS mpr_ko FROM cure c, CURE_DETAIL cd, DISEASES s, MPRICE m WHERE c.CD_CODE = cd.CD_CODE AND s.DZ_NUM =c.DZ_NUM AND m.MPR_CODE = c.MPR_CODE and cd.P_NO = #{pNo}

SELECT CD_REGDATE, cd.CD_UR_JAW,cd.CD_UL_JAW,cd.CD_BR_JAW,cd.CD_BL_JAW, m.MEM_NAME, tl.TL_NAME FROM CURE_DETAIL cd INNER JOIN PATIENT_TREATMENT pt ON cd.CD_CODE = pt.CD_CODE INNER JOIN PATIENT_DISEASE pd ON pd.CD_CODE = cd.CD_CODE INNER JOIN "MEMBER" m ON m.MEM_ID = cd.MEM_ID INNER JOIN TREATMENT_LIST tl ON tl.TL_NUMBER = pt.TL_NUMBER WHERE cd.P_NO = #{pNo} GROUP BY cd.CD_REGDATE, cd.CD_UR_JAW,cd.CD_UL_JAW,cd.CD_BR_JAW,cd.CD_BL_JAW, m.MEM_NAME, tl.TL_NAME ORDER BY 1 DESC

select cd.cd_code cd_code, cd.cd_regdate cd_regdate, ccc.ccc_number ccc_number, ccc.ccc_name ccc_name, m.mem_name mem_name, c.cure_code cure_code, NVL(cd.cd_note,'없음') AS cd_note, COUNT(*)OVER(PARTITION BY to_char(cd.cd_regdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')) AS datecount, cd.cd_ur_jaw cd_ur_jaw, cd.cd_ul_jaw cd_ul_jaw, cd.cd_br_jaw cd_br_jaw, cd.cd_bl_jaw cd_bl_jaw, cd.cd_pi from cure_detail cd inner join member m on m.mem_id = cd.mem_id LEFT OUTER join cure c on cd.cd_code = c.cd_code inner join cd_cat_code ccc on cd.ccc_number = ccc.ccc_number where cd.p_no = ${pNo} order by cd_regdate
mapper.update: insert into CURE_DETAIL( CD_CODE, P_NO, MEM_ID, CD_UR_JAW, CD_UL_JAW, CD_BR_JAW, CD_BL_JAW, CD_PI, CCC_NUMBER ) values( CURE_DETAIL_CD_CODE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, '${pNo}', '${memId}', '${cdUrJaw}', '${cdUlJaw}', '${cdBrJaw}', '${cdBlJaw}', '${cdPi}', 1 )
mapper.insert: insert into CURE_DETAIL( CD_CODE, P_NO, MEM_ID, CD_NOTE, CD_UR_JAW, CD_UL_JAW, CD_BR_JAW, CD_BL_JAW, CD_TOTALPAY, CCC_NUMBER ) values( CURE_DETAIL_CD_CODE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{pNo}, #{memId}, #{cdNote}, #{cdUrJaw}, #{cdUlJaw}, #{cdBrJaw}, #{cdBlJaw}, #{cdTotalpay}, 0 )
insert into CURE_DETAIL( CD_CODE, P_NO, MEM_ID, CCC_NUMBER ) values( CURE_DETAIL_CD_CODE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{pNo}, #{memId}, 2 )
